name: Donkey Show
description: This rum cocktail gets extra gingery from the muddled fresh ginger root and ginger liqueur.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 inch thick slice of fresh ginger root, peeled
1 ounce rum such as Treaty Oak
1 ounce Domaine de Canton ginger liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Muddle the ginger root in a cocktail shaker. Add rum, ginger liqueur, lime juice, and simple syrup to cocktail shaker. Fill with ice and shake for 15 seconds.
Strain into a pint glass filled with ice and top with ginger ale. Garnish with a lime slice and serve with a straw.
